name: wct-jira-xray
description: A Plugin for Web Component Tester to report test result to JIRA using XRAY import API
author: Kampfmoehre <kampfmoehre@gmx.de>

testExecutionVersion.help: The Version that is set in the Test Execution as Fix Version

jiraHost.help: The host address of the JIRA instance to report tests to

jiraPort.help: The port of the JIRA instance to report tests to

jiraAuthorization.help: The authorization token for the JIRA instance to report tests to
